channel.title: Lost Legacy
channel.description:
[center]
Hey guys, check out my new project: [URL=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,625787.0.html]Ventus - Be Ready.[/URL]
________________________________________________________________________________________________________
[IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/f1ijp.png[/img]
[URL=http://"http://www.rune-server.org/members/reader/"]Reader[/URL] released this and he had no permission to do so what so ever. This was entirely my work. Things did not work between us and since I did all the work I decided to sell it. I had every right to sell it as I started Lost Legacy to begin with. Well I guess I am forced to release this now as there is no other option. Enjoy.
[u][size=18pt]Features[/size][/u]
*Amazing Combat *Full Chaotic + PvP Armor Degrading *Fullscreen *All Nex Armours With Effect *Curses 100% *Quick Prayers *Skillng Zone *New Runescape Hitsplats *All Dupes Fixed *Many Pk Locations *All Skills Functioning *Dragon Claws 100% *Fast Fluid Client *Perfect Eco *Amazing Stability *Perfect Switching *New Runescape Cursors *Amazing Graphics *Xp Counter *Fun Minigames *Unique Content *Full Member System *Unique Clan Chat System *Many Trainning Locations *A Lot Of Bosses *Fun Killstreak System *Symbol Support *Dicing *Frost Dragons - System *Revenant Cave *Autocasting
[u][size=18pt]Media[/size][/u]
[img]http://i49.tinypic.com/51t1lh.png[/img] [img]http://i45.tinypic.com/5x5uz9.png[/img] [img]http://i46.tinypic.com/qrkkfa.png[/img] [img]http://i50.tinypic.com/2nhlu86.png[/img] [img]http://i45.tinypic.com/5l8kdz.png[/img] [img]http://i49.tinypic.com/2z80vnb.png[/img] [IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/rkow8j.png[/img] [IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/2zyldn9.png[/img] [IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/244xj6c.png[/img] [IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/1199oqs.png[/img] [IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/jq5l6q.png[/img] [img]http://i45.tinypic.com/33u67tf.png[/img] [img]http://i49.tinypic.com/346qo7a.png[/img] [img]http://i46.tinypic.com/1zwozyb.png[/img] [img]http://i50.tinypic.com/2dslc8p.png[/img] [img]http://i45.tinypic.com/ftf3i9.png[/img] [img]http://i45.tinypic.com/jb74fs.png[/img] [img]http://i49.tinypic.com/33ljhiq.png[/img] [img]http://i46.tinypic.com/24gsmd3.png[/img] [img]http://i45.tinypic.com/2zs31ty.png[/img] [img]http://i47.tinypic.com/1se2co.png[/img] [IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/10coh35.png[/img] [IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/352gccj.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/hrHfL5z.gif[/img]
Thanks to Aintario for his sprites and client methods. However the sever sided is completely redone. No dupes etc.. [youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=0C0Wk76Gvb4[[/youtube]
[u][size=18pt]Credits[/size][/u]
Evan - Developed with me, great friend, Hot hat<3 Connor - Helped me out in tough situations and he's a great friend Intrum - Midget helper<3 Aj - Helped & motivated me Jason - Good friend, helped me out Goliath - Whatagoodfriendheis<3 Reader - Meh. And a lot of other people<3
[u][size=18pt]Downloads[/size][/u]
Client & Source [URL=http://"http://uppit.com/lmk5mtxkprlu/Lost_Legacy.rar"]Lost Legacy Package[/URL] Cache [URL=http://"https://www.dropbox.com/s/2z0hs5nnkyoxsau/LostLegacyCache.rar"]Lost Legacy Cache[/URL][/center]

item.title: Lost Legacy
item.dc:creator: @Naseem Naseem
item.description:
@Naseem wrote:

[quote=“Carmex, post:84, topic:506929”]Oh i see i must have copied and pasted wrong somewhere but now I have just one more problem
With this code everyone with playerRights 1 or greater can teleport to staffzone meaning donor who’s (playerRights= 4) can also teleport to staffzone.
What now:/

if (playerCommand.equals("staffzone") && c.playerRights >= 1) { c.getPA().startTeleport(2152, 5095, 0, "modern"); ///c.sendMessage("Welcome to StaffZone."); }[/quote]

Well, try this:

if (playerCommand.equals("staffzone") && c.playerRights == 1 || c.playerRights == 2 || c.playerRights == 3) { c.getPA().startTeleport(2152, 5095, 0, "modern"); ///c.sendMessage("Welcome to StaffZone."); }

Read full topic

item.title: Lost Legacy
item.dc:creator: @killerjens9 killerjens9
item.description:
@killerjens9 wrote:

[quote=“Carmex, post:80, topic:506929”][quote author=killerjens9 link=topic=625161.msg4300429#msg4300429 date=1368902947]

So I made myself owner but i cant yell… how do i fix this

look in commands.java
[/quote]
ty i figured it out
Also i was wonder how to change the background of the log in screen where it has the picture of the nuke and says lost legacy?
And one last thing, I created a staffzone and was wondering how i would make it so that only staff can use the ::staffzone command[/quote]
you change background in your cache/sprites and make staffzone your just add in this command (change coords) if (playerCommand.equals("staffzone") && c.playerRights >= 1) { c.getPA().startTeleport(2152, 5095, 0, "modern"); ///c.sendMessage("Welcome to StaffZone."); }

Read full topic
